name: InnitForTheTECH
description: INNIT is an ERC 20 token, supporting the development of the INNIT Platform - social analytics & AI-based smart crypto investment tool. 1. Alpha as a Service: Powered by Social Intelligence - Twitter & Telegram Integration/Data Analysis; Onchain Analytics - Safety checks & identify smart money movements. 2. Influencer Analytics: identify legit market makers, and their impact on the market, and spot the network of people working together. 3. Campaign management tool: enabling projects to implement fair & transparent Shill-2-Earn campaigns & monitor their community engagement.
